entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Sambaa K'e
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:16 a.m. MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 9:03 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
